skins.shipDescription: New Orleans-class heavy cruiser ®C Astoria, hull number CA-34.
skins.selfIntroduction: Heyyo! I'm Astoria, the eldest sister of the New Orleans class! Why am I not the nameship? Um... it's kind of a long story, hehe... But that doesn't make me any less of a big sister. Commander, you can rely on me, that is if you want to~
skins.acquisition: Yo, Commander! I'm Astoria, eldest sister of the New Orleans-class! If you're ever having any troubles, you can always come talk to me~
skins.login: Commander, you can totally rely on me more!
skins.details: Heyyo~ Commander, you look awfully bored~
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm not very smart, so I'll pass on the complicated stuff, but when it comes to life advice, I'm your gal!
skins.secretaryIdle2: New Orleans sure matured into a fine big sister. What a gal!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, even though you're very knowledgeable, I'm sure there's some stuff that not even you know~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah... wait... Jeez, Commander, you jerk!

skins.shipDescription: Huh? Commander? ... Wait, why are you staring at me like I'm some exotic animal? C-cute? Ehehe... Th-thanks...
skins.acquisition: Huh? Commander? ... Wait, why are you staring at me like I'm some exotic animal? C-cute? Ehehe... Th-thanks...
skins.login: Today's horoscope says... Romance... five stars?! Like, no way~!
skins.details: Commander, wanna put a karaoke machine in the office? Like, we should totally work hard and play hard!
skins.secretaryIdle1: By the way, Commander, do you use any social media sites? They're quite popular among the girls, you know~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, what color nails do you prefer? Next time I get them done, I'll let show them to you~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Club activities? Ahaha... I think I have a date with my sofa today...
skins.secretaryTouch: Look, Commander! This place is a five-star recommended dating spot!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, would you prefer the pepper spray or a shot from my cannons?
